content:
I am trying to find this paper and cannot find it anywhere:

J. Lambek. From λ-calculus to cartesian closed categories. In J. R. Hindley and J. P. Seldin, editors. To H. B. Curry, Essays on Combinatory Logic, Lambda Calculus and Formalism. Academic Press, London, 1980.

Does anybody know where I can get it?
Yes! I went to the MIT Libraries in 2016 to digitize this paper. Here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-ox998pGwSzZlNfRnEwSzRMbkE/view?usp=drivesdk&resourcekey=0-AW7Pmt6_H96reNIhezFiTQ
I wonder whether there’s any straightforward way to add such a scan to SciHub.

FWIW seems like it is; the whole book "To H.B. Curry, Essays ..." appears to be on anna's archive, which indexes libgen and scihub. One might need to think of searching for the series instead of the specific article.
